name: Paper Cliff
description:
Submission for VimJam 2.0

Controls:

AD or Left and Right - Move left/right

W - Jump/ Climb cliff

D - Dive

LeftClick - shoot

RightClick - Switch Weapon

Overview:

This is an 2d platformer action game where you play as a stickman with guns and try to defeat the boss as quick as you can. The Boss has 3 phases, and after each phase,  you gain 1 more jump and a new weapon, but the ground will shrink.
